CustomField.formula: AND( (ZipTerritory__c != null) ,OR( (User__c != ZipTerritory__r.TerritoryRep__c ) ,( District__c != ZipTerritory__r.District__c ) ,( ZipTerritory__r.TerritoryRep__c != null && HR_Person_Id__c != ZipTerritory__r.TerritoryRep__r.HR_Person_Id__c ) ,( ZipTerritory__r.TerritoryRep__c != null && ZipTerritory__r.TerritoryRep__r.IsActive = false) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If the zip assignment differs from the zip territory in a few key aspects we'll mark it as needing to be updated.
CustomField.label: Needs Update
